dailyReports.summary: Full Autonomy Deployed — 4 Replit→GitHub syncs, 11 cron jobs, 4 sub-agents live, content pipeline working

4 sub-agents executed successfully (SPM, JETR, Markets, X Specialist)

Cron delivery pattern: mode:none + message tool
